Tiger Force

Sallah, Michael Weiss, Mitch

Published by Hodder & Stoughton Ltd, 2006

ISBN 10: 0340752491 / ISBN 13: 9780340752494

Used / Hardcover First Edition

Seller: Cocksparrow Books, Salisbury, WILTS, United Kingdom

(4-star seller) Seller rating 4 out of 5 stars

Hardcover. Condition: F/F/VG++. y First Edition, 1st. Imp. HARDBACK "RARELY AVAILABLE OUTSIDE THE US," SHIPPED FROM THE UK* Edition: 1st. Thus.* Impression: 1st.* Date of Publication: 2006* Publisher: Hodder & Stoughton.* Binding and cover condition: Black cloth, gilt title to spine. No bumps or rubs, no visible faults. FINE* Jacket condition: Colour photo-illustrated dust wrapper. NOT PRICE CLIPPED, showing shelf price of Â£20.00. Slight shelf wear to top edge and to head of spine. VG++* Contents condition: PRIVATE COPY NOT EX-LIBRARY. Clean, crisp, tight and bright with no reading wear, no marks to text, no visible faults. FINE.* Illustrations: One block of 8 pp. b/w photos and line drawn maps within text.* Pages: 322 pp. text. lxxxiii pp. acknowledgements & index at rear.* Description: For seven months in 1967 the soldiers of Tiger Force in Vietnam lost control in a frenzy of torture, mutilation and cold-blooded murder. Stories started to leak back of women and children blown to pieces; of innocent civilians being routinely executed; of beheaded children and necklaces made from the severed ears of the dead. Afterwards no-one would talk about what happened, and the official investigation was swiftly curtailed. TIGER FORCE is the previously unheard account of the true actions of these doomed men, and the consequences of this dark chapter in recent history.* A NEAR FINE copy of the 1st. edition 1st. impression with minor shelf wear reducing it to VG++* 2006-05-08. n. Seller Inventory # 4016

Tiger Force

Sallati, Mike; Weiss, Mitch

Published by Hodder & Stoughton, Lons, 2006

ISBN 10: 0340752491 / ISBN 13: 9780340752494

Used / Hardcover First Edition

Seller: CHARLES BOSSOM, Ely, CAMBS, United Kingdom

(5-star seller) Seller rating 5 out of 5 stars

Hard Cover. Condition: Very Good. Dust Jacket Condition: Very Good. Photographs (illustrator). First Edition. Dust jacket complete, unclipped. Black cloth with gilt titling on spine. No ownership inscription. Photographs. 401 pages clean and tight. THE SHOCKING TRUE STORY OF AMERICAN SOLIDERS OUT OF CONTROL IN VIETNAM, BASED ON PLITZER-PRIZE WINNING INVESTIGATIONS BY MICHAEL SALLAH AND MITCH WEISS. FOR SEVEN MONTHS IN 1967 THE SOLDIERS OF THE ELITE RECONNAISSANCE UNIT TIGER FORCE LOST CONTROL IN A FRENZY OF TORTURE, MUTILATION AND COLD-BLOODED MURDER IN VIETNAM. STORIES STARTED TO LEAK BACK OF WOMEN AND CHILDREN BLOWN TO PIECES: OF INNOCENT CIVILIANS BEING ROUTINELY EXECUTED: OF BEHEADED CHILDREN AND NECKLACES MADE FROM THE SEVERED EARS OF THE DEAD. AFTERWARDS FEW WOULD TALK ABOUT WHAT HAPPENED, AND THE OFFICIAL INVESTIGATION WAS SWIFTLY CURTAILED. THE ACTIONS OF TIGER FORCE IN THE VIETNAM WAR HAVE NEVER BEEN MADE PUBLIC. THE EXPERIMENTAL UNIT OF ELITE SOLDIERS FOUND ITSELF IN A BRUTAL AND BAFFLING WAR WHERE THERE WERE NO RULES. AND THEIR REACTION WAS CATASTROPHIC. Size: 8vo. Seller Inventory # 130276
